campaign.title: Weekly Specials - Colorblock Hoodies (Feb 9, 2026)
campaign.subject: Apollo & Lotte Colorblocked Hoodies - This Week's Special
campaign.notes: Weekly specials newsletter featuring Apollo Colorblocked Hoodie for Men and Lotte Colorblocked Hoodie for Women. Both patterns on sale at $8.99 (from $10.99). Sale ends Sunday, February 16th, 2026. Color scheme: Teal/slate gradient (#4a9d9c to #6b8388) to complement colorblocked hoodie aesthetic.
